basics.name: Anonymous
basics.label: Director of Applications
basics.summary: Accomplished Healthcare Professional with an exemplary background in Healthcare IT. Proven ability in strategic planning, business requirements gathering, creating roadmap with short term and long term goals, budget estimation and management, negotiation, return on investment and return on value analysis. Proactive leader with an excellent work ethic and commitment to exceptional customer service.

work.name: Anonymous Company
work.summary: Management of all IT Applications (Administrative, Clinical, Revenue Cycle, Ambulatory, Ancillary). Manage $5M budget. Evaluate organizations IT needs, create strategic plan and implement new projects. Negotiation: Saved over $250,000 when purchasing new products.
highlights: Managed staff: 7 Application Analysts, 2 Team Leads and 2 Consultants.

Lead implementation of computerized provider order entry (CPOE), provider documentation, nursing documentation, bedside medication verification, LAB glucose monitoring system (RALS), EHR/Application upgrades (Meditech, Curaspan and Midas)

work.name: Anonymous Company
work.summary: 140+ licensed bed for-profit organization with 3 outpatient clinics. Project management, product evaluation and contract management. Saved over $75,000 by negotiating price when purchasing new products. Introduced project management methodologies.
highlights: Successfully attested for Stage 1 Year 1 and prepared documentation for CMS audit.

work.name: Anonymous Company
work.summary: Prepared project plan for implementation of computerized physician order entry, ordersets (Zynx), physician and nursing documentation, e-prescription, clinical portal, single sign-on and Meaningful Use Stage 1 initiative.
highlights: 2000+ licensed bed for-profit Healthcare Organization with 15 Hospitals and several Ambulatory clinics
